participant_1.name: Margaret
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, enjoys sharing experiences.
participant_1.background: I have visited Spain a few times. I think I'll retire in a few years. I really like to travel. I'm a librarian. I'm 60 years old.

participant_2.name: Henry
participant_2.personality: Charismatic and lively, enjoys reminiscing and socializing.
participant_2.background: I'm very strong for my age. I remember when nobody had a television. I feel like I might live forever. I love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight.

content.text:
I am little bit shy☺️ 
Tell me about yourself!

I am little bit shy☺
Tell me about yourself!
I am a librarian, i am a librarian. Are you a librarian?
i am retired, but i'm very strong for my age
I am 57 and have a job in kansas. Do you really like to travel?
don't think so. i love to drink wine and dance in the moonlight
I was on a cruise once, i am not sure if i could do that are you 60years old?
no, i remember when nobody had a television.
I am sorry. I am not really a reader. I love romance novels.
I like romantic comedies. I like christian fiction books.
